name: Flamigo
flavorText: This Pokémon apparently ties the base of its neck into a knot so that energy stored in its belly does not escape from its beak.

previous.name: Houndstone
previous.flavorText: Houndstone spends most of its time sleeping in graveyards. Among all the dog Pokémon, this one is most loyal to its master.

next.name: Cetoddle
next.flavorText: This species left the ocean and began living on land a very long time ago. It seems to be closely related to Wailmer.
